title: Yasmin Karachiwala: The Pioneer Of Pilates, And Country's Most Sought After Celebrity Trainer
text:
facebook Remember how all of us raged over Katrina Kaif's washboard abs in the video of kaala chashma , calling it the perfect revenge body? She didn't take the easy way out of a crash diet or surgery, but worked her ass off to get that body. The driving force behind Kaif's transformation was none other than the celebrity trainer, Yasmin Karachiwala. Watch #KatrinaKaif at her best!!! Dance, body, look... She's a #dream. Links in bio if you want to see the full song #kalachashma #sidharthmalhotra #shecanmove A post shared by Yasmin Karachiwala (@yasminkarachiwala) on Jul 27, 2016 at 5:19am PDT 
It's not just Katrina Kaif's revenge body that Karachiwala is responsible for. Deepika Padukone, Alia Bhatt, Parineeti Chopra, Malaika Arora Khan, and Kareena Kapoor Khan are just a few of the big names she works with. Yasmin has changed the face of fitness in our country. Author of Shape And Sculpt: The Pilates Way , and the first BASI certified Pilates instructor in the country, she has taken the regime from being completely unheard of, to pretty much a household name. But, the accolades in her kitty only begin with this. As a Pilates instructor, she is certified to teach on the mat, reformer, cadillac, wunda chair, and step barrell. These are the uber cool equipments that you see in the videos below: A post shared by Yasmin Karachiwala (@yasminkarachiwala) on Feb 8, 2017 at 8:44am PST A post shared by Yasmin Karachiwala (@yasminkarachiwala) on Feb 17, 2017 at 9:28pm PST A post shared by Yasmin Karachiwala (@yasminkarachiwala) on Feb 23, 2017 at 7:26am PST @deepikapadukone gets ready to rock it on the red carpet for the MTV EMA awards by doing the Hanging Swan on the #Trapeze #Pilates #BeFitwithYasminKarachiwala #befitbecauseyoudeserveit #yasminfitnessmantra #YasminsBodyImage #fitnessgoals #FitnessExpert #FitnFabulous #PilatesMasterTrainer #CelebrityTrainer #DeepikaPadukone #pilatesgirl #PilatesforAthletes A post shared by Yasmin Karachiwala (@yasminkarachiwala) on Nov 6, 2016 at 11:05pm PST She is an ACE certified group and personal trainer, and a Balance Body certified trainer Core-Align, BB Barre, and Motr. But wait, it doesn't stop here. She is also certified to teach TRX, Kettle bells, core suspend, core barre, core reform, and functional training. She has earned her place as the most sought after celebrity trainer, and the results prove her mettle! A post shared by Yasmin Karachiwala (@yasminkarachiwala) on Oct 25, 2016 at 9:02pm PDT A post shared by Yasmin Karachiwala (@yasminkarachiwala) on Oct 14, 2016 at 10:12pm PDT A post shared by Yasmin Karachiwala (@yasminkarachiwala) on Sep 14, 2016 at 7:50am PDT Woohoo what a long way you've come üëèüëèüëè #Repost @kritisanon „Éª„Éª„Éª Assisted Pull Ups wid @yasminkarachiwala üí™üèª #MondayMotivation #WorkInProgress #befitbecauseyoudeserveit #YasminsBodyImage #BeFitwithYasminKarachiwala #yasminfitnessmantra #PilatesMasterTrainer #FitnFabulous #FitnessExpert #fitnessgoals #CelebrityTrainer #kritisanon A post shared by Yasmin Karachiwala (@yasminkarachiwala) on Jul 25, 2016 at 11:08am PDT She is the founder, proprietor, and trainer at Body Image, her studio in Bandra, Mumbai, where she weaves customised plans for each one of her clients, depending on their body and needs. She also trains other instructors to teach Pilates, and the host of other fitness regimes that Yasmin is certified in. According to her, "Women need to realise that our ancestors' lives were far more active than our sedentary ones, with drivers, maids, and nannies at our beck and call. Women need to start strength training, and not just stick to cardio." Indeed, Yasmin Karachiwala is not just another person in the fitness industry who is only regurgitating tried and tested methods. She has a keen understanding of the needs of the country's women, and caters to that in the best way possible.
